title: New Report Shows Cancer Organization Shares Lobbyists with Fossil Fuel Companies
description:
A new report from F Minus shows the American Cancer Society’s Cancer Action Network shares lobbyists with 21 fossil fuel companies across 10 states, undermining the health organization's work.

The post New Report Shows Cancer Organization Shares Lobbyists with Fossil Fuel Companies appeared first on DeSmog.

title: Will The UK’s Flagship Climate ‘Solution’ Be Used to Pump More North Sea Oil?
description:
Documents unearthed by DeSmog show the oil industry has spent decades studying how a carbon capture and storage technology called "enhanced oil recovery" could be harnessed to recover billions of additional barrels of North Sea Oil, not just for storing carbon dioxide as planned by British Prime Minister Rishi Sunak.

The post Will The UK’s Flagship Climate ‘Solution’ Be Used to Pump More North Sea Oil? appeared first on DeSmog.
